definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: We can dance 'til the break of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以一直跳舞直到天明。

sentences.english: I'am Chen Tianming , from Shanghai post and telecommuincate service development company, I'am direct of the company's overseas department.
sentences.chinese: 我是上海邮电服务发展公司还外部主任陈天明。

sentences.english: I'm Tian-ming Yong, from ABC Company. I've been expecting you.
sentences.chinese: 我是ABC公司的杨天明，我正盼望您的到来。

sentences.english: The morning tea and lost contact with the organization, I do not know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 天明和茶茶失去了与组织的联系，不知如何是好。

sentences.english: I'm Chen Tianming, director of the Overseas Department of Shanghai Post and Telecommunications Service Development Company.
sentences.chinese: 我是上海邮电服务发展公司海外部主任陈天明。

sentences.english: You can have supper with us and a warm bed to sleep in until tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 你可以和我们共进晚餐，并在温暖的床上睡到天明。

sentences.english: Buildings in order to comfort LuoTianMing, her about doing had tea together.
sentences.chinese: 顾阡陌为了安慰骆天明，她约小春父子俩一起喝茶。

sentences.english: And I'll wade the Baishui River again at daybreak.
sentences.chinese: 等待到天明时我又要渡过白水。

sentences.english: A naked woman burns from midnight until the sky is bright.
sentences.chinese: 一个赤露的女人从午夜焚烧到天明。

sentences.english: Clubbers dance the morning away in June 2007 on Ibiza.
sentences.chinese: 伊比沙岛2007年6月，人们在俱乐部跳舞至天明。

sentences.english: Reviving the music of the Orchid Islands; a feast, lasting the whole night, from dusk til dawn.
sentences.chinese: 原音重现兰屿音乐夜宴，通宵达旦到天明。

sentences.english: Here she typed until the early hours and, after typing, ruthlessly cut what she had written.
sentences.chinese: 她在这里打字，直至天明。

sentences.english: Is to try and use 9 morning, killing the driver fat kui.
sentences.chinese: 尚九城为了再试天明，利用并杀死了司机胖奎。

sentences.english: Zhang Tianming made a new friend this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，张天明找到一个新朋友。

sentences.english: In order not to let Dai Tianming leak, the undead ordered Dai Tianming to shoot him.
sentences.chinese: 为了不让戴天明暴漏，不死鸟命令戴天明向他开枪。

sentences.english: In order not to let Dai Tianming leak, the undead ordered Dai Tianming to shoot him.
sentences.chinese: 为了不让戴天明暴漏，不死鸟命令戴天明向他开枪。

definition: first of the five night watch periods 19:00-21:00 (old)
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
fifth of the five night watch periods 03:00-05:00 (old)
the sun sets over western hills (idiom); the day approaches its end/fig. time of decline/the end of an era/Sic transit gloria mundi
the whole night/all through the night
